title: Wikipedia Module
text:
from wikiapp.wikipedia import random_page, Page
from nbdev import show_doc

title: Wikipedia Module
text:
Examples

page = random_page()
print("TITLE", page.title)
print("EXTRACT", page.extract)

TITLE Jadwiga Szoszler-Wilejto
EXTRACT Jadwiga Szoszler-Wilejto is a former Polish female Archer. She represented Poland at the Olympics on three occasions.


If you do this again, you will get another random page.

page = random_page()
print("TITLE", page.title)
print("EXTRACT", page.extract)

TITLE Kaye Hall
EXTRACT Kaye Marie Hall, later known by her married name Kaye Greff, is an American former competition swimmer, two-time Olympic champion, and former world record-holder in two events.


You can change the language you want

page = random_page(language="fr")
print("TITLE", page.title)
print("EXTRACT", page.extract)

TITLE Sam Altman
EXTRACT Sam Altman est un homme d'affaires am√©ricain n√© le 22 avril 1985 √† Chicago. Il est cofondateur avec Elon Musk de l'organisation √† but lucratif plafonn√© OpenAI, dont il est le directeur g√©n√©ral. En novembre 2023, son limogeage provoque une crise au sein de la soci√©t√©, il est alors r√©int√©gr√© √† son poste cinq jours plus tard par un conseil d'administration remani√©.



page = random_page(language="es")
print("TITLE", page.title)
print("EXTRACT", page.extract)

TITLE Russ Giguere
EXTRACT Russell Giguere es un m√∫sico estadounidense, ampliamente conocido por su trabajo en The Association.

title: Wikiapp Docs
text:
Welcome to the documentation for Wikiapp!
This library will let you get random Wikipedia page excerpts in any language.

23 to 30 May 2010.

title: Console Module
text:
from wikiapp.console import main


from nbdev import show_doc





 <Command main> (*args:Any, **kwargs:Any)

*This is the console interface to random page function in wikipedia.py.
It comes with cool colors!*
